thread.title: Justin Verlander reacts to Kate Upton's SI Swimsuit cover
thread.title_full: Justin Verlander reacts to Kate Upton's SI Swimsuit cover

author: Brian
title: Justin Verlander reacts to Kate Upton's SI Swimsuit cover

organizations.name: upton  sports illustrated yu tsai  sports illustrated

text:
Feb 15, 2017 at 11:54a ET 0Shares 
The three covers of the 2017 edition of the Sports Ilustrated Swimsuit Issue was revealed Wednesday, and all feature SI Swimsuit veteran Kate Upton. 
Justin Verlander, Upton's fiancé, was unable to spend Valentine's Day with Upton on Tuesday, but he congratulated her on the honor and reacted to the cover on Twitter. Upton is on the cover of the SI Swimsuit issue for the third time, after landing the cover in 2012 and 2013 
Sports Illustrated Yu Tsai There are three separate covers for SI Swimsuit 2017, all featuring Upton 
Sports Illustrated Yu Tsai 
Sports Illustrated Yu Tsai A number of athletes are featured in the 2017 issue, including Serena Williams, Genie Bouchard, Caroline Wozniacki, Simone Biles and Aly Raisman. 
©Emmanuelle Hauguel Sports Illustrated/Getty Images 
You can check out more photos of the featured athletes on SI.com . ©Emmanuelle Hauguel Sports Illustrated/Getty Images
